tasks.task: Install irrigation system in a high tunnel.
subtasks: Position header pipe near the water tower.
Route two-inch pipe along the high tunnel's length.
Install a 90-degree elbow to connect pipe to the water tower.
Securely clamp three-quarter inch hose onto the pipe.
Use channel locks to tighten garden hose connections.
Explain and prepare the medium-sized irrigation system components.
Connect half-inch poly pipe to the three-quarter inch hose.
Terminate drip tape ends with puncture tool and repair kit.
Install Bluetooth hose end irrigation controller for scheduling.
Address the untaped clamp due to time constraints.
